original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhuniyo gāmakāvāse vassaṁvuṭṭhā sāvatthiṁ agamaṁsu.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena sambahulāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ gāmaka āvāse vassa vuṭṭhāḥ sāvatthim agamasu
na maya ayye bhikkhu saṅgham pavārema ati

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ appicchāḥ pe tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo vassaṁvuṭṭhā bhikkhusaṅghaṁ na pavāressantī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhuniyaḥ vassa vuṭṭhāḥ bhikkhu saṅgham na pavāressanti iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo vassaṁvuṭṭhā bhikkhusaṅghaṁ na pavārentī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ vassa vuṭṭhāḥ bhikkhu saṅgham na pavārenti iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo vassaṁvuṭṭhā bhikkhusaṅghaṁ na pavāressanti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ vassa vuṭṭhāḥ bhikkhu saṅgham na pavāressanti
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu

original: “Yā pana bhikkhunī vassaṁvuṭṭhā ubhatosaṅghe tīhi ṭhānehi na pavāreyya diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī vassa vuṭṭhā ubhatosaṅghe tīhi ṭhānehi na pavāreyya diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā pācittiyanti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī iti

original: purimaṁ vā temāsaṁ pacchimaṁ vā temāsaṁ vuṭṭhā.
analyzed: purimam vā temāsam pacchimam vā temāsam vuṭṭhā

original: Ubhatosaṅghe tīhi ṭhānehi na pavāressāmi diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā”ti dhuraṁ nikkhittamatte āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: ubhatosaṅghe tīhi ṭhānehi na pavāressāmi diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā ati dhuram nikkhitta matte āpatti pācittiyassa
